name: Company Code
description: codeÂ in SAP (four digits stored as text, for example, US = 1000, Canada = 2000, Germany = 4016, France = 4013, Netherlands = 4100) used to organize accounting information related to business transactions, representing the smallest organizational unit for which a complete self-contained set of accounts can be drawn up for purposes of external reporting, financial statements, and profit and loss statements, stored as a string
